ISSUE.TITLE: Export states to CSV - states_2019-05-17-10-22-00_9573.txt
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: admin-demo.nopcommerce.com Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to Admin panel>>Configuration>>Countries and press button "Export states to CSV". System export states_2019-05-17-10-22-00_9573.txt file

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3855 Changed file extension to .csv when exporting to CSV format
